sense.def: Illness Sign of profuse topical moisture and sweating. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 101: 治腋下濕汗不止，及足 心、手掌、陰下、股裏，常如汗濕臭者方 , “Recipes to cure unending moisture with sweating under the armpits, as well as constant conditions resembling sweating with moisture stench on the soles of the feet, on the palms of the hands, below the private parts, and on the insides of the thighs.
